get.summary: Get binding configuration for given binding ID.

500.description: Configuration can not be read due to internal error

put.summary: Updates a binding configuration for given binding ID and returns the old configuration.

500.description: Configuration can not be updated due to internal error

200.description: Channel type with provided channelTypeUID does not exist.

get.summary: Gets the item types the given trigger channel type UID can be linked to.

204.description: No content: channel type has no linkable items or is no trigger channel.

404.description: Given channel type UID not found.

get.summary: Gets a config description by URI.
Gets all bindings that support discovery.

post.summary: Starts asynchronous discovery process for a binding and returns the timeout in seconds of the discovery operation.
Installs the extension from the given URL.

400.description: The given URL is malformed or not valid.

post.summary: Installs the extension with the given ID.

get.summary: Gets the list of widget gallery items.
Gets the details about a widget gallery item.

404.description: Unknown gallery or gallery item not found

delete.summary: Removes the discovery result from the inbox.

404.description: Discovery result not found in the inbox.

post.summary: Approves the discovery result by adding the thing to the registry.

404.description: Thing not found in the inbox.

409.description: No binding found that supports this thing.

post.summary: Flags a discovery result as ignored for further processing.
Removes ignore flag from a discovery result.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: limit output to the given fields (comma separated)

put.summary: Adds a list of items to the registry or updates the existing items.
Adds a new member to a group item.

404.description: Item or member item not found or item is not of type group item.

delete.summary: Removes an existing member from a group item.

404.description: Item or member item not found or item is not of type group item.

post.summary: Sends a command to an item.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: valid item command (e.g. ON, OFF, UP, DOWN, REFRESH)

put.summary: Adds a new item to the registry or updates the existing item.

delete.summary: Removes an item from the registry.

404.description: Item not found or item is not editable.

get.summary: Gets the state of an item.

put.summary: Updates the state of an item.
Adds a tag to an item.

delete.summary: Removes a tag from an item.

get.summary: Tells whether automatic link mode is active or not

400.description: Content does not match the path

get.summary: Gets a list of persistence services.
Gets a list of items available via a specific persistence service.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Id of the persistence service. If not provided the default service will be used

get.summary: Gets item persistence data from the persistence service.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Id of the persistence service. If not provided the default service will be used

parameters.name: starttime
parameters.description: Start time of the data to return. Will default to 1 day before endtime. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: endtime
parameters.description: End time of the data to return. Will default to current time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of data to return. This parameter will enable paging.

parameters.name: boundary
parameters.description: Gets one value before and after the requested period.

put.summary: Stores item persistence data into the persistence service.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Id of the persistence service. If not provided the default service will be used

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time of the data to be stored. Will default to current time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

delete.summary: Delete item data from a specific persistence service.

parameters.name: starttime
parameters.description: Start time of the data to return. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: endtime
parameters.description: End time of the data to return. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

get.summary: Get configurable service for given service ID.
Get service configuration for given service ID.

500.description: Configuration can not be read due to internal error

put.summary: Updates a service configuration for given service ID and returns the old configuration.

500.description: Configuration can not be updated due to internal error

delete.summary: Deletes a service configuration for given service ID and returns the old configuration.

500.description: Configuration can not be deleted due to internal error

get.summary: Polls the data for a sitemap.

400.description: Invalid subscription id has been provided.

404.description: Sitemap with requested name does not exist or page does not exist, or page refers to a non-linkable widget

get.summary: Gets all available thing types without config description, channels and properties.

200.description: Thing type with provided thingTypeUID does not exist.

get.summary: Get all available firmwares for provided thingType

post.summary: Creates a new thing and adds it to the registry.

400.description: A uid must be provided, if no binding can create a thing of this type.

409.description: A thing with the same uid already exists.
Thing could not be updated as it is not editable.

delete.summary: Removes a thing from the registry. Set 'force' to __true__ if you want the thing te be removed immediately.

409.description: Thing could not be deleted because it's not editable.

400.description: Configuration of the thing is not valid.

409.description: Thing could not be updated as it is not editable.

204.description: No firmware status provided by this Thing.

get.summary: Get the list of all interpreters.

post.summary: Sends a text to the default human language interpreter.

404.description: No human language interpreter was found.

post.summary: Sends a text to a given human language interpreter.

404.description: No human language interpreter was found.
